page.title: 05EDUCATION IN DENBIGH(2)
page.content: Denbigh schools have not escaped strike action initiated by some {Teachers' Unions}with hundreds of pupils missing lessons.The teacher's believe the action is necessary to improve educational standards and save teachers' jobs against a backdrop of continuing Government cutbacks.Pupils continue to bring great credit to respective schools.{Sponsered events {provide}funds for various charities. Youngsters from the Welsh medium school appeared at the St.David's day concert at the Albert Hall.Pupils from Frongoch School contributed to{B.B.C. {radio}and won the{Urdd 7-a-side rugby {shield}for the{6th}successive time. High School pupils have appeared in numerous soccer and rugby finals.A rugby team from{St.Stephen High {School,}New Brunswick visited the High School.
